definitions.definition: The breastbone , consisting of the manubrium , gladiolus , and xiphoid process .
The sclerotized ventral plate of spiders , between the coxae , marking the floor of the cephalothorax .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The breastbone , consisting of the manubrium , gladiolus , and xiphoid process . [from 1660]
secondary_definitions: ( arachnology ) The sclerotized ventral plate of spiders , between the coxae , marking the floor of the cephalothorax .
